name: LD38 - What Remains
description:
Entry for LD38. Theme: "Small World" 

LD link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/what-remains

----------------------------------

This is a shelter-like game. How many people can you gather and how much time can you survive? Assign actions to them so they can gather resources needed to buy some infrastructure which in turn is needed for people to last longer!

Based on LD feedback, this game is actually very well balanced! There are a few bugs here and there, but they're somewhat rare. 

----------------------------------

TEAM

  • Fiote [Developer & Voices] (https://twitter.com/FioTactics)
  • Chesu [Artist] (http://sprite-byte.com)

----------------------------------

TECHNOLOGY:

The game was done in JavaScript with HTML5/canvas. No gamelib was used!
